text:
@GOPChairwoman @craigkell11 U.S has just 4.2% of World Population yet
U.S has 32.7% of World Coronavirus Cases, 
U.S has 26.7% of World Coronavirus Deaths!
Obviously clear example Trump lies and people die!
U.S tested only 5,353,358 out of 330,065,019 Americans
1.6% of U.S tested behind 40 other countries!
